exceptions.exn: In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_ub_Rbar E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b b : R H3 : E (- b) Unable to unify "is_ub_Rbar E l" with "Rbar_le (Rbar_opp l) b".
In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_ub_Rbar E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b b : R H3 : E (- b) Unable to unify "E (- b)" with "Rbar_le (Rbar_opp l) b".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_ub_Rbar E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b b : Rbar H3 : is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b Unable to unify "match l with | Finite x => match ?M2296 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match ?M2296 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "match b with | Finite x => match Rbar_opp l with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Rbar_opp l with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end".

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_ub_Rbar E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b b : Rbar H3 : is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b Unable to unify "is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b" with "Rbar_le b (Rbar_opp l)".

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) (Rbar_opp l) H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b -> Rbar_le b (Rbar_opp l) b : R H3 : E b Unable to unify "is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) (Rbar_opp l)" with "Rbar_le b l".

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) (Rbar_opp l) H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b -> Rbar_le b (Rbar_opp l) b : R H3 : E b Unable to unify "E b" with "Rbar_le b l".

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) (Rbar_opp l) H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b -> Rbar_le b (Rbar_opp l) b : Rbar H3 : is_ub_Rbar E b Unable to unify "match ?M2305 with | Finite x => match Rbar_opp l with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Rbar_opp l with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "match l with | Finite x => match b with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match b with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end".

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) (Rbar_opp l) H2 : forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar (fun x : R => E (- x)) b -> Rbar_le b (Rbar_opp l) b : Rbar H3 : is_ub_Rbar E b Unable to unify "is_ub_Rbar E b" with "Rbar_le l b".

original: intros E l. split. - intros [H1 H2]. split. + intros b H3. apply H1. intros x H4. apply H3. exists (-x). auto. + intros b H3. apply H2. intros x H4. apply H3. exists (-x). auto. - intros [H1 H2]. split. + intros b H3. apply H1. intros x H4. apply H3. exists (-x). auto. + intros b H3. apply H2. intros x H4. apply H3. exists (-x). auto.
